sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Badge, Button, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, Outlet, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useApp } from '../../contexts/AppContext'; import { productsAPI, ordersAPI } from '../../services/api'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/common/LoadingSpinner'; import Message from '../../components/common/Message'; // Add this import import InventoryAlerts from '../../components/alerts/InventoryAlerts'; const SellerDashboard = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({}); const [recentOrders, setRecentOrders] = useState([]); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const { user } = useAuth(); const { formatPrice } = useApp(); const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Redirect if not seller React.useEffect(() => { if (user && user.role !== 'seller') { navigate('/'); } }, [user, navigate]); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { // Mock data for seller dashboard const mockStats = { totalRevenue: 45000, totalOrders: 34, totalProducts: 12, pendingOrders: 5, averageRating: 4.5 }; const mockOrders = [ { _id: '1', orderNumber: 'ORD-001', totalAmount: 1500, status: 'processing', createdAt: '2024-01-15T10:30:00Z', customer: { name: 'John Doe' } }, { _id: '2', orderNumber: 'ORD-002', totalAmount: 2500, status: 'shipped', createdAt: '2024-01-14T14:20:00Z', customer: { name: 'Jane Smith' } } ]; const mockProducts = [ { _id: '1', name: { en: 'Product One' }, price: 1000, stock: 15, status: 'active', images: [] }, { _id: '2', name: { en: 'Product Two' }, price: 2000, stock: 3, status: 'active', images: [] } ]; setStats(mockStats); setRecentOrders(mockOrders); setProducts(mockProducts); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching seller data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const alertsCount = products.filter(p => p.stock < 5).length; if (loading) return ; if (!user || user.role !== 'seller') { return Access denied. Seller privileges required.; } // If we're on a sub-route, render the outlet if (location.pathname !== '/seller') { return ; } return (
Seller Menu
Dashboard Products Orders Analytics Inventory Control Promotions Reports Store Profile {/* Add this navigation item for Inventory Alerts */} Inventory Alerts {alertsCount > 0 && ( {alertsCount} )}
{/* Welcome Header */}

Welcome back, {user.name}!

Here's what's happening with your store today.

 {/* Stats Cards */}

{formatPrice(stats.totalRevenue || 0)}

Total Revenue

{stats.totalOrders || 0}

Total Orders

{stats.totalProducts || 0}

Products

{stats.pendingOrders || 0}

Pending Orders

{stats.averageRating || 0}

Avg Rating

{alertsCount}

Low Stock {/* Recent Orders */}
Recent Orders
View All {recentOrders.map(order => ( ))}
Order # Customer Amount Status
{order.orderNumber} {order.customer.name} {formatPrice(order.totalAmount)} {order.status}
{/* Product Overview */}
Product Overview
Manage {products.map(product => ( ))}
Product Price Stock Status
{product.name.en} {formatPrice(product.price)} {product.stock} {product.status}
{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
 ); }; export default SellerDashboard;
